message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1200000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1200000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts on this revised offer.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1300000. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1220000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1200000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts on this revised offer.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $1280000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment at this price.
